document_data.name: Grimblades
document_data.mainbody: The '''Grimblades''' were an [[adventuring company]] that operated around the [[Inner Sea]] lands in the late 13th century [[DR]]. The Grimblades were led by [[Kesten Orthalin|Kesten "Steelglance" Orthalin]].
